result.title: Functional Programming Contest, Lambda Calculi June'14
result.content:
Lambda Calculi (Functional Programming Contest) is back with 5 interesting challenges lined up for June edition. This contest will commence at 6 30 AM UTC, 20th June and will run for a extended period of 10 days. You can sign up for the contest here. Registration will be open till the end of contest.

This contest is primarily aimed for the functional programming enthusiasts and whosoever interested in learning this.

This month's contest is prepared by boleyn.su, wRabbits_AlMag, Grant Boudreaux, Deepak Gupta, scturtle, Stimim Chen, darkshadows and me

Languages allowed are: Haskell, Scala, Lisp, Erlang, Clojure, OCaml and F#.
